feature.name: smoker
feature.description: Whether the patient is smoking currently. We check the last smoking status record and expect that it does not have an end date indicating that the patient is a current smoker

feature.name: formerSmoker
feature.description: Whether the patient smoked within 1 year prior to the admission.
